column4: I'm looking for a good linux dist to install on a 566Mhz celeron...  the ubuntu live-cd is TOO-SLOW.  Will it work if I install it?
livecd's are inherently slow. installed is always faster
would you expect ubuntu to run okay on an old 566Celeron w/178MB Ram?.. or is there another dist that would work better?
it would be fine. i would likely use fluxbox for a windowmanager though
